resource.chars:
I may say that the fact 
that the officers who made 
the observations were not,
so I gathered, consulted 
before corrections were 
applied appears to be the 
point most likely to be the 
subject of comment, and if 
Any Explanation is forthcoming 
I should be glad to know 
it early. In the mean time 
please dont trouble to write 
Yours sincerely 
Leonard Darwin.
